name: ActuX
description:
You are over the circuit board and, your mission is to link the circuit.

To do that, you'll have to grab a money symbol to activate the lightning dump. The lightning dump it will appear at the bottom of the circuit board. Run to the dump to make it jump.

You'll need to do it twenty times to complete linking the circuit.

Take green crosses to speed the player movement or reds to slow it down.

Try to avoid hitting the lightning or other energy balls.

And, of course, don't jump out of the circuit board without the parachute!

-- PC Controls -- 

Arrows or 'ASDW' to move the player

Escape to pause the game

Use the mouse to select between the menu
